title: MD
biography: Georgios Nikolaou Papanikolaou was a Greek physician, zoologist and microscopist who was a pioneer in cytopathology and early cancer detection, and inventor of the pap smear for detection of cervical cancer.
aiSummary: George Papanicolaou is a cytopathology specialist with an H-index of 59 at Cornell University (Member). Has been published in New England Journal of Medicine, Nature Genetics, Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
